H0.text: what international organizations is china part of. International Monetary Fund (IMF)

H1.text: what international organizations is china part of. Asian Development Bank (ADB)

H2.text: what international organizations is china part of. United Nations (UN)

H3.text: what international organizations is china part of. World Bank

A4.text: All members of the IMF are also International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) members and vice versa.

A5.text: Emerging markets were not well-represented for most of the IMF's history: Despite being the most populous country, China's vote share was the sixth largest.

A6.text: In December 2005, China donated $20 million to the ADB for a regional poverty alleviation fund; China's first such fund set up at an international institution.

A7.text: All the world's undisputed independent states are members of the United Nations.

A8.text: The Republic of China joined the World Bank on December 27, 1945.

A9.text: The People's Republic of China replaced the ROC in the World Bank on April 16, 1980.
